user_query: of soil requires 40 liters of water to be farmable so I gotta make a lot more water good thing is I know the recipe now I have hundreds of liters of unused hydrazine at the MDV if I run the hydrazine over an iridium catalyst it'll separate into N2 and H2 and then if I just direct the hydrogen into a small area and burn it [Music] onward and upward in the mission of their agency I need you to authorize my satellite time not gonna happen got 12 satellites up there surely we could spare a few hours what about the satellite Time Fence the second we point the satellites at Mars I broadcast pictures of Mark Watney's dead body to the world you're afraid of a PR problem Congress won't reimburse us for a paper clip if I put a dead astronaut on the front page of the Washington Post it's a good cover sit down Annie this is security this is Mindy Park in SatCon I need the emergency contact for Vincent Kapoor how sure 100 you've got to be [ __ ] kidding me according to the logs Commander Lewis took it out Sol 17 plugged it into the hab to recharge it's been moved well why don't we just ask Lewis let's get on Capcom and ask her directly right now no no if Watney is really alive we don't want the Aries 3 crew to know how can you not tell them they have another 10 months on their trip home space travel is dangerous they need to be alert and undistracted can you imagine what he's going through up there I mean he's 50 million miles away from home he thinks he's totally alone he thinks we gave
